cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 5th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard Pod in a room of 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Private individual single POD in a 8Pod share room for solo traveler. Featuring safe & secure lockable storage, king single mattress with USB & power points, in-built ventilation. Free Wi-Fi and access to shared kitchen, bathroom & laundry facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Private individual single POD in a Female share room for Female solo traveler. Featuring safe &secure lockable storage, king single mattress with USB &power points, in-built ventilation. Free Wi-Fi &access to shared kitchen, bathroom & laundry facilities.

privates.name: Standard 8 Bed Family Room Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Price is for the whole room with 8PODs, so bring your friends and family. Each POD has mattress, linen, USB charging unit, Electric socket, Fan, Free WiFi, 8 Storage Locker in the room. Shared Bathroom. Towels available at additional cost. Sleep 8 guests.
